mapper.insert: insert into "SCOTT"."JOIN_BOARD" (PLAN_ID, USER_ID, TITLE,CONTENT, PERSONNEL ,START_DAY , END_DAY, DESTINATION ,FINISH_DATE) values ( JOIN_BOARD_PLANID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId} , #{title}, #{content} ,#{personnel} ,#{startDay}, #{endDay} ,#{destination},#{finishDate})

insert into "SCOTT"."JOIN_BOARD_IMGS" (PLAN_ID,IMG_FILE_NAME,IMG_FILE_SQC) values ( #{planId}, #{imgFileName}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(IMG_FILE_SQC),0)+1 FROM "SCOTT"."JOIN_BOARD_IMGS" WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId}) )
mapper.select: select plan_id, user_id, title, content, destination, personnel, start_day, end_day, reg_date, finish_date, plan_state, REGEXP_SUBSTR(content, '<img[^>]+>', 1, 1) as first_image from join_board
select PLAN_ID from "SCOTT"."JOIN_BOARD" where USER_ID = #{userId} AND TITLE = #{title} AND CONTENT = #{content}
